comments:
Created an attachment (id=80715)
eclipse project in a zip file

Build ID: M20070921-1145

Steps To Reproduce:
Execute the file workflow.oaw as "oAW Workflow"


More information:
This issue had been discussed in openArchitectureWare's support forum.  Karsten suggested me to submit it as a bug.  Though, I am not sure if it is the right place to file this bug.  Please advise.

Attached please find the project in zip format.
